name:name: # ^ Equipment file demonstrating "exploded columns" - complex nested data expressed as simple flat columns
# ^ The stats.* columns form a record {damage:integer,defense:integer,durability:integer}
# ^ The gridPos._* columns form a tuple {integer,integer} representing (x, y) coordinates
# ^ The effects[*] columns form an array of strings (special effects on the item)
# ^ The bonuses[*] columns form a map of attribute names to bonus values {[name]=integer}
